text: int main ( ) { int test ; int line ; int mat [ 1000 ] [ 1000 ] ; int sum [ 200 ] = { 0 } ; int i , j , k ; scanf ( "%d" , & test ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < test ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & line ) ; k = 0 ; for ( j = 0 ; j < line ; j ++ ) { while ( k <= j ) { scanf ( "%d" , & mat [ j ] [ k ] ) ; k ++ ; } } sum [ i ] = mat [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; k = 0 ; for ( j = 1 ; j < line , k <= j ; j ++ ) { if ( mat [ j ] [ k ] > mat [ j ] [ k + 1 ] ) { sum [ i ] = sum [ i ] + mat [ j ] [ k ] ; } else { sum [ i ] = sum [ i ] + mat [ j ] [ k + 1 ] ; k = k + 1 ; } } } for ( i = 0 ; i < test ; i ++ ) printf ( "%d\n" , sum [ i ] ) ; return 0 ; }
